chat_history.message: Hello, My product is iPhone 13 mini and it has the above problem: When will it finally be shipped? Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

According to the tracking, I see that you have not yet delivered the package to the carrier.

Please ship the device today and provide a valid tracking number.

Leo Gonschorek
Kobestr. 2
20457 Hamburg
Deutschland
+4917649841063

Regards,
Ercan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, the parcel seems to have been stolen. We will conduct an internal investigation accordingly. We have hence refunded the customer in full for this order.
Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
YR
